prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that resembles a cocoon with a soft, purple exterior.
Show me a Pokemon that evolves from a cocoon and has vibrant wings and a cheerful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon with a round body and spikes that blend into its forest habitat.
Generate a tiny Pokemon that is primarily purple and has a calm, protective personality.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the concept of metamorphosis, starting as a cocoon.
Give me a design for a bug-type Pokemon with a unique cocoon shape and soothing colors.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands and has a soft, spiky appearance.
